description.english: Bounce the chicken 30 times
description.brazilian: Quicar a galinha 30 vezes
description.russian: Отскочите курицу 30 раз
description.schinese: 弹跳小鸡30次
description.tchinese: 彈跳雞30次
description.spanish: Golpea el pollo 30 veces

description.english: Drag the chicken on any surface for 10 seconds
description.brazilian: Arraste a galinha em qualquer superfície por 10 segundos
description.russian: Перетаскивайте курицу по любой поверхности в течение 10 секунд
description.schinese: 在任何表面上拖动小鸡10秒钟
description.tchinese: 將小雞拖曳在任何表面上10秒
description.spanish: Arrastra el pollo 10 segundos por cualquier superficie

description.english: Hit all cans with a single throw
description.brazilian: Acerte todas as latas com um único arremesso
description.russian: Попадите во все банки одним метанием
description.schinese: 一次性用一个投掷物命中所有罐子
description.tchinese: 一次性擊中所有罐子
description.spanish: Golpea todas las latas a la vez

description.english: Pass the chicken through 30 magic hoops successfully
description.brazilian: Passe a galinha por 30 arcos mágicos com sucesso
description.russian: Пропустите курицу через 30 волшебных кольца успешно
description.schinese: 成功通过30个魔法圈
description.tchinese: 成功通過30個魔法箍圈內
description.spanish: Pasa el pollo por 30 aros y haz que se pongan verdes

description.english: Hit the green punching dummy 30 consecutive times
description.brazilian: Acerte o boneco de pancadas verde 30 vezes consecutivas
description.russian: Попадите в зеленого манекена 30 раз подряд
description.schinese: 连续击中绿色沙袋30次
description.tchinese: 連續打擊綠色沙袋30次
description.spanish: Golpea el maniquí verde 30 veces seguidas

description.english: Hit the red punching dummy 30 consecutive times
description.brazilian: Acerte o boneco de pancadas vermelho 30 vezes consecutivas
description.russian: Попадите в красного манекена 30 раз подряд
description.schinese: 连续击中红色沙袋30次
description.tchinese: 連續打擊紅色沙袋30次
description.spanish: Golpea el maniquí rojo 30 veces seguidas

description.english: Pop numbered balloons in order from 0 to 9
description.brazilian: Estoure balões numerados de 0 a 9 em ordem
description.russian: Лопните нумерованные воздушные шарики в порядке от 0 до 9
description.schinese: 按顺序戳破编号为0到9的气球
description.tchinese: 按編號順序彈爆氣球，從0到9
description.spanish: Explota los globos con números del 0 al 9

description.english: Make the chicken bounce 30 times on coloured balloons without popping them
description.brazilian: Faça a galinha quicar 30 vezes em balões coloridos sem estourá-los
description.russian: Заставьте курицу отскакивать 30 раз на цветных шарах, не лопнув их
description.schinese: 让小鸡在有颜色的气球上弹跳30次，而不戳破它们
description.tchinese: 在有顏色的氣球上讓小雞彈跳30次而不破裂
description.spanish: Haz rebotar al pollo 30 veces contra los globos de colores sin que exploten

description.english: Launch and thread the chicken in the fork
description.brazilian: Lance e passe a galinha pelo garfo
description.russian: Запустите и проткните курицу вилкой
description.schinese: 发射并穿过叉子中的小鸡
description.tchinese: 發射並穿越叉子上的小雞
description.spanish: Lanza y trincha el pollo en el tenedor

description.english: Accumulate 60 seconds spinning the chicken in the air
description.brazilian: Acumule 60 segundos girando a galinha no ar
description.russian: Накопите 60 секунд, крутя курицу в воздухе
description.schinese: 在空中累积旋转小鸡60秒
description.tchinese: 在空中累計旋轉小雞60秒
description.spanish: Acumula 60 segundos girando el pollo en el aire

description.english: Pop the egg 30 times
description.brazilian: Estoure o ovo 30 vezes
description.russian: Лопните яйцо 30 раз
description.schinese: 弹爆蛋30次
description.tchinese: 彈爆蛋30次
description.spanish: Revienta 30 huevos

description.english: Take the egg to the nest once
description.brazilian: Leve o ovo até o ninho uma vez
description.russian: Доставьте яйцо в гнездо один раз
description.schinese: 把蛋带到巢里一次
description.tchinese: 將蛋帶到巢中一次
description.spanish: Lleva el huevo al nido una vez

description.english: Destroy the ceiling lamp once
description.brazilian: Destrua a luminária do teto uma vez
description.russian: Разрушите потолочный светильник один раз
description.schinese: 摧毁天花板灯一次
description.tchinese: 摧毀吊燈一次
description.spanish: Rompe la lámpara

description.english: Fly through the magic hoops successfully and set them all green at the same time
description.brazilian: Passe pelos arcos mágicos com sucesso e os deixe todos verdes ao mesmo tempo
description.russian: Пролетите успешно через волшебные кольца и сделайте их все зелеными одновременно
description.schinese: 成功飞越魔法圈并同时将它们全部变成绿色
description.tchinese: 成功飛過魔法箍圈，同時將它們全部變成綠色
description.spanish: Pasa el pollo por todos los aros hasta que se pongan verdes al mismo tiempo

description.english: Knock the door 75 times
description.brazilian: Bata na porta 75 vezes
description.russian: Стучите в дверь 75 раз
description.schinese: 敲门75次
description.tchinese: 敲門75次
description.spanish: Golpea la puerta 75 veces

description.english: Fail 50 times when launching the chicken by triggering the red warning
description.brazilian: Falhe 50 vezes ao lançar a galinha acionando o aviso vermelho
description.russian: Проваливайте 50 раз при запуске курицы, активируя красное предупреждение
description.schinese: 启动小鸡时触发红色警告，失败50次
description.tchinese: 在發射小雞時觸發紅色警告，失敗50次
description.spanish: Falla 50 veces haciendo que las zonas designadas se tornen rojas

description.english: Score 5 baskets with the chicken
description.brazilian: Faça 5 cestas com a galinha
description.russian: Забей 5 корзин курицей
description.schinese: 用小鸡得分5个篮球
description.tchinese: 用小雞投進5個籃球
description.spanish: Mete 5 canastas con el pollo

description.english: Pop all the colored balloons leaving the red ones at each corner intact
description.brazilian: Estoure todos os balões coloridos deixando os vermelhos em cada canto intactos
description.russian: Лопните все цветные шары, оставив красные угловые нетронутыми
description.schinese: 戳破所有有颜色的气球，保留每个角上的红色气球不变
description.tchinese: 彈爆所有有顏色的氣球，將紅色的氣球留在每個角落
description.spanish: Explota todos los globos de colores dejando intactos los cuatro rojos de las esquinas

description.english: Squeeze the chicken 300 times
description.brazilian: Aperte a galinha 300 vezes
description.russian: Сжимайте курицу 300 раз
description.schinese: 挤压小鸡300次
description.tchinese: 擠壓小雞300次
description.spanish: Estruja el pollo 300 veces

description.english: Pop the red ballons at each corner leaving the rest intact
description.brazilian: Estoure os balões vermelhos em cada canto deixando o restante intacto
description.russian: Лопните красные шары в каждом углу, оставив остальные нетронутыми
description.schinese: 戳破每个角上的红色气球，保留其他气球不变
description.tchinese: 彈爆每個角落的紅色氣球，其他的保持完好
description.spanish: Explota los cuatro globos rojos de las esquinas dejando el resto intactos
